synopsis.text: Musume: Pretty Derby - 1st Anniversary Special Animation" marks the celebration of the first anniversary of the popular mobile game "Uma Musume Pretty Derby," released in Japan on February 21, 2021. The story unfolds at the prestigious Tracen Academy during its spring entrance ceremony, where two aspiring students, Kitasan Black and Satono Diamond, embark on their respective journeys. Kitasan Black, uncertain of her dreams, sets out to discover her true potential with a fresh start, while Satono Diamond strives to achieve victory in the GI race to honor her family's long-held desire. As the two young hopefuls set their hearts on their goals, the outcome of their endeavors remains a mystery, creating an exciting and suspenseful atmosphere for viewers.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
